attributes.comment:
To whom it may concern
I think that it is outrageous to raise the fee. These people who are wanting to
adopt are our daughter and son in law and they are the ones working their tails off
to get everything ready, filled out, and into the proper places. It has been at least
five months and they are no where. I suggest you take the money already alotted
and hire some competent people or computer programs to speed up the process.
I also suggest that you take $500 of the $545 and give back to the people wanting
to adopt to spend on the child when they get her. It would be better spent.
Please don't raise the fee, it already costs an arm and a leg.
Thanks for your consideration in this matter.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Adell Lovell
